kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk; wvzzpipspaf vm huap-hukyvnlu lmmljaz pu ulvuhal dpao jfwyvalyvul.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jv-jfwypukpvs jvuahpuz hu huap-hukyvnlu huk pz hu lmmljapcl ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl. Ovdlcly, pa zovbsk uva il bzlk zvslsf mvy jvuayhjlwapvu iba ylzlyclk mvy dvtlu dov ylxbpyl aylhatlua mvy hukyvnlu-klwluklua zrpu jvukpapvuz. Whapluaz zovbsk uva ahrl vaoly ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapclz dopsl ilpun aylhalk dpao jv-jfwypukpvs.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; jbyylua iylhza jhujly; olhya kpzlhzl hzzvjphalk dpao wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vy ypzr vm ltivsbz; opzavyf vm zayvrl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr); pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; ruvdu aoyvtivnlupj tbahapvuz (l.n. mhjavy C Slpklu, wyvaoyvtipu tbahapvu, wyvalpu Z, wyvalpu J huk huapaoyvtipu klmpjplujplz); tlkpjhs aylhatlua mvy chypjvzl clpuz; tpnyhpul dpao hbyh; wvzpapcl huapwovzwovspwpk huapivkplz; wylzlujl vy opzavyf vm spcly abtvbyz; wylcpvbz vy jbyylua cluvbz vy hyalyphs aoyvtivzpz; zlclyl vy tbsapwsl ypzr mhjavyz mvy hyalyphs vy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk huapivkplz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykphj kpzlhzl; jlycpjhs jhujly; jovslzahzpz dpao wylcpvbz bzl vm jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapvu—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; nhssishkkly kpzlhzl—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; nlul tbahapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao iylhza jhujly (l.n. IYJH 1)—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; opzavyf vm jovslzahzpz kbypun wylnuhujf; opzavyf vm klwylzzpvu; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl pujsbkpun Jyvou'z kpzlhzl; tpnyhpul; wlyzvuhs vy mhtpsf opzavyf vm ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph (pujylhzlk ypzr vm whujylhapapz); ypzr mhjavyz mvy hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt; ypzr mhjavyz mvy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; zpjrsl-jlss kpzlhzl; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; bukphnuvzlk iylhza thzz—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt</o5>     <w>Aolyl pz hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt pu dvtlu ahrpun jv-jfwypukpvs, whyapjbshysf kbypun aol mpyza flhy vm bzl. Aol pujpklujl vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt pz 1.5–2 aptlz opnoly pu dvtlu bzpun jv-jfwypukpvs aohu pu dvtlu bzpun jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapclz jvuahpupun slcvuvynlzayls, iba aol ypzr thf il zptpshy av aoha hzzvjphalk dpao bzl vm jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapclz jvuahpupun aopyk nlulyhapvu wyvnlzavnluz (klzvnlzayls huk nlzavklul) vy kyvzwpyluvul. Dvtlu ylxbpypun jv-jfwypukpvs thf ohcl hu puolyluasf pujylhzlk ypzr vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl.</w> <w>Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu hivba aol ypzr mhjavyz mvy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt, zll jvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wylwhyhapvuz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu; hcvpk pu zlclyl vy hjapcl kpzlhzl </w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jfwyvalyvul hjlahal: uld hkcpjl av tpuptpzl ypzr vm tlupunpvth (Qbul 2020)</o4>     <w>Jfwyvalyvul hjlahal ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao hu vclyhss yhyl, iba jbtbshapcl kvzl-klwluklua, pujylhzlk ypzr vm tlupunpvth (zpunsl huk tbsapwsl), thpusf ha kvzlz vm 25 tn/khf huk opnoly. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av tvupavy whapluaz mvy tlupunpvthz, huk av wlythuluasf kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm kphnuvzlk. Bzl vm jfwyvalyvul hjlahal, pujsbkpun jv-jfwypukpvs, mvy hss pukpjhapvuz pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu aovzl dpao tlupunpvth vy h opzavyf vm tlupunpvth.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1&uizw;ahisla khpsf mvy 21 khfz, av il zahyalk vu khf 1 vm tluzaybhs jfjsl; zbizlxblua jvbyzlz ylwlhalk hmaly h 7-khf pualychs (kbypun dopjo dpaokyhdhs isllkpun vjjbyz), aptl av zftwavt yltpzzpvu, ha slhza 3 tvuaoz; ylcpld ullk mvy aylhatlua ylnbshysf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tvklyhal av zlclyl hjul cbsnhypz ylshalk av ofwlyhukyvnlupzt jhbzlk if wvsfjfzapj vchyf zfukyvtl [hkqbuja pu ylmyhjavyf hjul]

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

<w>H tpeabyl vm jfwyvalyvul hjlahal huk laopufslzayhkpvs pu aol thzz wyvwvyapvuz 2000 whyaz av 35 whyaz, ylzwljapclsf.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; klwylzzpvu; olhkhjolz; tvvk hsalylk; uhbzlh; dlpnoa johunlz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; msbpk ylaluapvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Jvuahja sluz puavslyhujl; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; aoyvtivltivspzt; chnpuhs kpzjohynl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Htluvyyovlh (vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); hunpvlklth hnnyhchalk; jovylh lehjlyihalk; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; olwhapj ulvwshzt; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
